tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE biometric_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    biometric_type VARCHAR(50),
    biometric_data BLOB,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_credentials (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    password VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    last_login TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE authentication_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    biometric_type VARCHAR(50),
    match_score FLOAT,
    authentication_result BOOLEAN,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE authentication_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    real_bio_id INT,
    authentication_time TIMESTAMP,
    authentication_result BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE biometric_data (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    fingerprint_data BYTEA NOT NULL,
    face_data BYTEA NOT NULL,
    voice_data BYTEA NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE real_time_inputs (
    input_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    fingerprint_input BYTEA NOT NULL,
    face_input BYTEA NOT NULL,
    voice_input BYTEA NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
